body: So since there is a CTW tournament I would just like to voice an opinion. So ocn was the competitive server I grew up with. However once it closed I migrated here and learned to love it. However Avicus does not have things called Safety Wools or Proximity (?). So this Tm is CTW and probably doesn't want to create what was t5. I would like to think that they should implement safety wools. If Avicus allowed safety wools in scrims or tms it would allow for easier gameplay. It could help worser teams to cap against better teams and allow for second chances. Safety wools also allow for easier tms. Safety wools also introduce the idea of Prox. I don't know how Avicus run CTW tms, but what I have heard is that Prox does not occur. Avicus should implement proximity in all CTW tm matches  via safety wools. I believe that it would be easier to  eliminate ties between teams. These are all just my opinions but yeah. What do you think?

title: Safety Wools and Proximity

replies.body:
it's a map maker choice atm (to enable safeties)

The Only issue is that Avicus has infinite wools (grab as much wool as you want such as 6 stacks of it) instead of regenerative wools (chests start with wool but once it's empty, the wool reappears every x amount of time) which can affect safeties. I don't know if there's a way to disable that other than using the glitch when wool chests are double chests and they don't refil so you're limited to the 54 wool blocks (unless there's more chests)

procimity exists but i don't know if it calculates a win (touches don't affect score either last time I played ctw)

hope this helps and it's not hard to understand what I'm talking about

we can only sit here and wait for the map department of the official team to release the maps and give us 10 days of preparation (and hopefully they don't edit the map and change the whole thing 2 days before the tournament)
